name: Антиперспирант Deonica Невидимый, 200мл
ingredients: Isobutane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Butane, Propane, Triethyl Citrate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dimethicone (and) Dimethiconol, Bisabolol, Parfum, Propylene Carbonate, Citrollol, Linalool, Limonene, Butylphenyl Methylpropional.
